org.jorge.fightclub.gui

Class FatherAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jorge.fightclub.gui.FatherAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionBoxer, ActionCoach, ActionDojo

    public abstract class FatherAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    Father class to every single action tag. with abstract method and parameters method. Created by jorge on 11/11/14.
